tool_description: Humor API lets you search through 50,000 jokes, over 200,000 memes, and gifs. From Chuck Norris, over Knock Knock to Yo Mama jokes, you'll find something for every occasion.
name: Humor-Jokes-and-Memes
title: Humor-Jokes-and-Memes

api_list.name: Create Joke
api_list.description: Create a joke using a large language model.

test_endpoint.joke: Why couldn't the pirate learn the alphabet? Because he kept getting lost at C.

api_list.name: insult
api_list.description:
Insult somebody for doing something.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Insult for more.

test_endpoint.text: Right on Alex, you untalented dumb fuck, you did it again.

example-1.text: Bravo Alex, you mastermind, you did it again.

api_list.name: generate-nonsense-word
api_list.description:
Generate a nonsense word.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Generate-Nonsense-Word for more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://humor-jokes-and-memes.p.rapidapi.com/words/nonsense/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humor-jokes-and-memes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

Search for gifs.

optional_parameters.description: The number of results to retrieve between 1 and 10.

api_list.name: random-meme
api_list.description:
Get a random meme.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Random-Meme for more.

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated list of keywords.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to retrieve between 1 and 10.

optional_parameters.name: media-type
optional_parameters.description: The type of the content. Can be either 'image' or 'video' or specific formats such as 'jpg', 'png', 'gif', or 'mp4'.

optional_parameters.name: keywords-in-image
optional_parameters.description: Whether the keywords should be found in the meme's image.

optional_parameters.name: min-rating
optional_parameters.description: The minimum rating between 0 and 10 the result should have.

test_endpoint.message: You have exceeded the rate limit per second for your plan, BASIC, by the API provider

Search for jokes.

optional_parameters.description: A comma separated list of tags that the joke must not have.

optional_parameters.name: max-length
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of letters in the joke.

api_list.name: analyze-joke
api_list.description:
Analyze a joke.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Analyze-Joke for more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://humor-jokes-and-memes.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humor-jokes-and-memes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

example-1.joke: What do you call a deer without eyes? No ideer.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humor-jokes-and-memes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
